sourcesContent:
import "./showcase.css"; export default function CardShowCase(props) { console.log(props.formData); const {fullName, aboutMe, githubURL, twitterURL, favouriteBooks, HTML, CSS, JS, React, NodeJS} = props.formData; const technologies = [HTML, CSS, JS, React, NodeJS] const techArry = ["HTML", "CSS", "JS", "React", "NodeJS"] const technologiesObj = {HTML: false, CSS: false, JS: false, NodeJS: false} let index = 0; technologies.forEach(element => { technologiesObj[techArry[index]] = element; }); console.log(technologiesObj) const splitName = fullName.split(" ") return (
   {fullName}   Full Stack Developer

Connect with {splitName[0]}

 Welcome to {splitName[0]}'s corner of the Internet

 About me

{aboutMe}

 Technologies

 My favorite books

  1. The Lord of the Rings - J. R. R. Tolkien

  2. Foundation series - Isaac Asimov

  3. Cracking the Coding Interview - Gayle Laakmann

  4. Clean Code - Rob Martin

  5. A Brief History of Time - Stephen Hawking

); }
